content:
Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft a cut_sandstone_slab, I need to craft cut_sandstone first. Cut_sandstone requires placing sandstone in a 2x2 square in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the sandstone from slot 35 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: I have already moved one sandstone into slot 1, and now I need to place another sandstone to its right in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I need to place the third sandstone below slot 1. This will complete the 2x2 square required for crafting cut_sandstone.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: Finally, I need to place the last sandstone to the right of the previous sandstone in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I can craft the cut_sandstone by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: I need to craft 6 cut_sandstone_slabs. Therefore I will need to place 3 cut_sandstones in the top row of the crafting table, starting from slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]

thought: I need to craft 6 cut_sandstone_slabs. Therefore I will need to place 3 cut_sandstones in the top row of the crafting table, starting from slot 1. I have already placed one in slot 1, so now I will place another in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]

thought: I need to craft 6 cut_sandstone_slabs. Therefore I will need to place 3 cut_sandstones in the top row of the crafting table, starting from slot 1. I have already placed two in slots 1 and 2, so now I will place another in slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cut_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}]
thought: I have successfully crafted the cut_sandstone_slabs. I will now move them from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 6
